headline: Who Is Looking for Collaborator(s)?
description:
Whether it is your side-project, idea, open source project in any field, whether it is tech, arts or research. Anything, that is not illegal. Please submit your request below in the following format:

1. Name of the project:

2. Field/Domain:

3. Stage of the project/start-up:

4. Number of people working:

5. Whether remote collaboration is available:

6. Skill-sets required, if any:

7. Duration of the project, if applicable:

8. Main geographic location of the project:

9. Compensation, if any:

10. Anything else you want to add:
